DOC.brief_summary: The objective study determine breast cancer risk Mirena® user compare copper intrauterine device ( IUD ) users community-based case-control study .
DOC.brief_title: Case-Control-Study Breast Cancer Risk Mirena® Compared With Copper IUDs
DOC.detailed_description: This community-based case-control study Germany Finland . Cases identify cancer registry , tumor center breast center . Matched control accrue region case come . Breast cancer case control woman 50 year age without known history malignancy . Cases woman breast cancer young 50 year age cancer diagnosis . The breast cancer diagnose January 2000 December 2007 . Only alive case case sufficiently good health status interview eligible study . Controls woman without breast cancer diagnosis young 50 year age time interview . About 3 control match year birth region allocate case . A standardized questionnaire use breast cancer case control . The questionnaire mail case control . Study participant ask informed consent . Data confidentiality accord national law ensure field organization .
